医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
迫切需要澄清检测到的索马鲁肽相关自杀意念信号研究人员调查了肥胖药物索马鲁肽和利拉鲁肽与自杀或自残药物不良反应之间的潜在联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240826/Clarification-urgently-needed-for-Detected-signal-of-semaglutide-linked-suicidal-ideation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240826/Clarification-urgently-needed-for-Detected-signal-of-semaglutide-linked-suicidal-ideation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e6eb237f-683d-41e5-9062-e2f7e58aee48 Mon, 26 Aug 2024 00:59:00 -0400 Clarification urgently needed for detected signal of semaglutide-linked suicidal ideation
工作场所健康通过每日 15 分钟运动挑战促进员工健康和健身15 分钟挑战是一项工作场所健康计划，显着改善了多个国家员工的身体活动水平和健康状况，显示出作为增强工作场所健康的有效干预措施的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240826/Workplace-wellness-boosts-employee-health-and-fitness-with-daily-15-minute-exercise-challenge.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240826/Workplace-wellness-boosts-employee-health-and-fitness-with-daily-15-minute-exercise-challenge.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3fa1b78-3487-49cf-85a7-f64c5fe9de21 Mon, 26 Aug 2024 00:47:00 -0400 Workplace wellness boosts employee health and fitness with daily 15-minute exercise challenge
研究发现肠道微生物代谢物可通过 β2 肾上腺素能受体调节心脏病风险研究确定苯乙酰谷氨酰胺 (PAGln)（一种肠道微生物组代谢物）是一种新型 β2-肾上腺素能受体变构调节剂，为了解其在心血管疾病 (CVD) 风险中的作用提供了见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240826/Gut-microbe-metabolite-found-to-modulate-heart-disease-risk-through-ceb22-adrenergic-receptors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240826/Gut-microbe-metabolite-found-to-modulate-heart-disease-risk-through-ceb22-adrenergic-receptors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=de9f8464-f994-4add-bd5c-3e0dcb258a95 Mon, 26 Aug 2024 00:04:00 -0400 Gut microbe metabolite found to modulate heart disease risk through β2-adrenergic receptors
疾病预防控制中心的研究揭示了由于检测标准不一致，美国各地汉坦病毒检测存在严重差距研究人员绘制了美国汉坦病毒的流行率和基因型分布图，强调了显着的地区差异和标准化检测的必要性https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240825/CDC-study-reveals-ritic-gaps-in-hantavirus-detection-across-the-US-due-to-inconcient-testing-standards.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240825/CDC-study-reveals-ritic-gaps-in-hantavirus-detection-across-the-US-due-to-inconcient-testing-standards.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=70b9b277-c042-4069-ae59-a551f3be1726 Sun, 25 Aug 2024 23:03:00 -0400 CDC study reveals critical gaps in hantavirus detection across the U.S. due to inconsistent testing standards
美国糖尿病发病率飙升 18.6%，凸显种族和经济差异研究人员评估了美国成年人糖尿病患病率的全国趋势和差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240825/Diabetes-rates-surge-18625-in-the-US-highlighting-racial-and-economic-disparities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240825/Diabetes-rates-surge-18625-in-the-US-highlighting-racial-and-economic-disparities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=40b80351-071f-474d-b835-b761d92d02de Sun, 25 Aug 2024 22:04:00 -0400 Diabetes rates surge 18.6% in the U.S., highlighting racial and economic disparities
八价鼻内流感疫苗被证明可以有效中和现有和新出现的毒株一种新的八价鼻内疫苗通过在雪貂中引发强烈的粘膜和全身免疫反应，在提供针对季节性和大流行前流感病毒株的广泛免疫力方面显示出有希望的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240825/Octavalent-intranasal-flu-vaccine-proves- effective-in-neutralizing-both-existing-and-emerging-strains.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240825/Octavalent-intranasal-flu-vaccine-proves- effective-in-neutralizing-both-existing-and-emerging-strains.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ec1344a5-a338-44c1-a9ce-130849622475 Sun, 25 Aug 2024 21:43:00 -0400 Octavalent intranasal flu vaccine proves effective in neutralizing both existing and emerging strains
工程化人体心脏组织揭示了狼疮自身抗体如何损害心脏研究表明，系统性红斑狼疮 (SLE) 患者的自身抗体通过结合并损害受压的心肌细胞而导致心肌损伤，从而为潜在的治疗靶点提供了见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240825/Engineered- human-cardiac-tissue-reveals-how-lupus-autoantibodies-damage-the-heart.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240825/Engineered- human-cardiac-tissue-reveals-how-lupus-autoantibodies-damage-the-heart.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=171970e5-7397-4360-87bf-60b0ddd3e327 Sun, 25 Aug 2024 21:18:00 -0400 Engineered human cardiac tissue reveals how lupus autoantibodies damage the heart
GPePV 神经元被认为是控制可卡因成瘾行为的关键参与者研究人员研究了 GPePV 细胞如何通过与腹侧被盖区多巴胺细胞的相互作用来调节可卡因诱导的行为。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240825/GPePV-neurons-identified-as-key-players-in-controlling-cocaine-addiction-behaviors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240825/GPePV-neurons-identified-as-key-players-in-controlling-cocaine-addiction-behaviors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bb68888f-939f-4c9d-a266-44113c6a2292 Sun, 25 Aug 2024 21:08:00 -0400 GPePV neurons identified as key players in controlling cocaine addiction behaviors
肉类消费显着增加 2 型糖尿病风险研究表明，在 10 年内，食用加工肉类、未加工红肉和家禽会增加全球不同人群患 2 型糖尿病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240825/Meat-conspiration-significantly-raises-type-2-diabetes-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240825/Meat-conspiration-significantly-raises-type-2-diabetes-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b1d48b1d-997e-4d22-863e-cab837f12f7a Sun, 25 Aug 2024 20:50:00 -0400 Meat consumption significantly raises type 2 diabetes risk
人类肠道微生物组：新型抗生素肽的来源研究人员从人类微生物组中鉴定出 323 种基于肽的抗菌药物，其中 71% 显示出显着的抗菌活性，并且先导肽 prevotellin-2 在体外和体内模型中与多粘菌素 B 的功效相匹配。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240825/Human-gut-microbiome-A-source-of-new-antibiotic-peptides.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240825/Human-gut-microbiome-A-source-of-new-antibiotic-peptides.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8268d15c-00a3-4b50-a653-27d7ddc4ddac Sun, 25 Aug 2024 19:12:00 -0400 Human gut microbiome: A source of new antibiotic peptides
